reviews.review: An amazing sequel to an amazing game. Highly recommended, especially to those suffering from a very minor case of serious brain damage.

Sublime,
Hay dos tipos de juegos en el mundo... EL Portal 2 y todos los demás...
Han salido y saldran juegos grandiosos y Portal 2 es uno de ellos. 
Al largo de todos los tiempos, Portal 2 lo recordaran como uno de los mejores juegos de toda la historia de los video juegos.
Un Juego para sibaritas q buscan algo más.

This game is GREAT! Well, more than GREAT!
Single player is epic, there are chambers that are difficult to solve, but the game is fun. This is 5 times better than the first game. You should try it!
Plus, Co-op Story mode after Single player, is fun too, with a friend!

I recommend you to buy it :)

This really is a must buy, of course you better play the origional first, but then again its pretty hard not to have by not. Its been given out free and under 5 dollars for years, and takes less than an hour to beat. But totally worth it.

Portal 2 takes that test concept, and multiplies it by 100. So many great new mechanics, and of course an amazing sotry with continued character development. Definettly worth the money.
Hilarious and amazing. Love it
this game is AWESOME, yet somehow terribly dissapointing...
BUY IT

Best game ever.  Hands down.

The only reason why I don't play it more is to savor the flavor.
Portal 2 improves upon it's predecessor in every way! Co-op is amazingly fun! The Source engine's still got Steam. Get it?
All I have to say is Portal 2 rocks.
Once I started, I couldn't put it down. Excellent single player campaign. Can't wait to try the co-op!
Sweet game!
The best 8 hours of the rest of your life. No, seriously.

Sequel to the most amazing game ever. Everything you loved about Portal 1, the complex puzzles, the mind twisting solutions and the fact that this game knows how to tell a story and not draw it out too long!

A MUST BUY for 2011.

C'est vraiment un bon jeu, il mérite vraiment sa note de 19/20 sur JVC et 10/10 sur JVFR.

Un solo super bien scénariser, une coop super fluide et agréable!
Bref, un superbe jeu, je le conseil à tout ceux qui ne l'ont pas.
Buy Portal 2...for science..you monster. Seriously, really good co-op game. I fully recommend it.

You know i thought this would be rubbish, but its just such great fun and funny. Plus the first robot you meet is just so funny(Co-writer of the uk office).

You will laugh and you will cry at solving the puzzles but its sheer class.
MASTERPIECE!
Awesome

Yes, buy this game RAWR... Now! You're thinking with portals
In one word - Perfect !!
write a recomedation...hmm...its goddam portal to buy it you fool !
Yes
Its PORTAL 2!!!! Enough said

Incredibly well written, funny as hell, the length is great, the puzzles range from simple to something that will rack your brains for most of an hour, the nostalgia and charm from the last game is still there and the co-op is utterly great. Truly one of the best games I've ever ever played. Get it now. Do it!

If you power through and don't get too stuck on puzzles, the SP will be over in about 6-7 hours, and the co-op will last another 6-7 hours of fun.

I highly recommend purchasing this game, as it both continues the storyline and provides some pain for the brain.

Some of the singleplayer puzzles can get frustrating simply due to being on your own, but the co-op puzzles are generally a laugh to do and experiment with; even if it means you repeatedly die or mess up.

Personally, there's not too high replayability as once you've solved the puzzles there aren't, as far as I'm aware, any other ways to complete the levels, and doing co-op while knowing the solutions kind of kills it, unless you're going to attempt to beat them under specific times.
If you enjoyed the first Portal, you are in for a hell of a ride! Didn't play the first Portal? You're still in for a hell of a ride! Valve fails to disappoint yet again.
Una parola: Magnifico.
Just a fucking awesome game!
If you enjoyed the 1st Portal game you will LOVE this new one. As always, you have done an amazing job Valve... excellent production quality and content. highly recommend this game
I still believe in the cake.
Get it. way longer than the first and more exciting.
Best singleplayer experience ever. No doubt about it. Epic (and I use that word rarely, unlike others) voice acting, great story, great everything.
Querias... batatinhas com enguias.

So, if you're playing Portal 2 worried that it won't live up to the memories of the original, allow me to dispel that fear right now: It's smarter, funnier, prettier and just plain better than you remember.

The Co-op mode is worth the £30 alone!
One of the games that is in MUST HAVE category. It's so mind blowing you won't believe your eyes .. or brain. Also you will feel the urge to have a cake after finishing it. You deserve it! 10/10
A game, anyone should have played!!!
Excelente juego,singleplayer una maravilla.Multiplayer completamente perfecto. Totalmente recomendado

This game is fantastic. I can't recommend it highly enough. The puzzles are taxing but far from impossible, and it's such a wonderful euphoria when you finally get that last piece of the puzzle. Single player and co-operative modes have separate story arcs, I recommend playing single player first as the co-operative story takes place immediately afterwards. And if you get stuck, I'll gladly give you hints as best I'm able.

Fact: Portal 2 has been out for 36 hours.
Also fact: I have at the time of writing been playing it for half of that time.
Also also fact: I was up until 8am last night playing this game.

Comedy gold. And lots of clever portal/physics puzzles. It's more of the same, yes, but with loads of extra bits, new toys, and the dialogue really has to be heard, it's just cracking quality all the way through.

Portal 2 is the “perfect” sequel to Portal. More adventure, more humor, more puzzles, more gameplay and more dialogue. Valve outdid themselves.
 
No cake here, but one of the best experiences you’ll ever have. This game will define future ones, that’s for sure.

SENSACIONAL!!!!! A campanha é 2 ou 3 vezes maior que do primeiro jogo. O co-op é muito bom também, realmente desafiador. Pensar com 4 portais é totalmente diferente. Um jogo que todo mundo precisa ter!!!
GAME OF THE YEAR 2011! ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!

If you think about it, Portal 2 is Valve's first epic story-driven game since Half-Life 2, and it was well worth the wait. A common theme in Valve's recent games are a bleak outlook for humanity - and Portal 2 mixes Half-Life's bleak, oppressive dystopian future with Left 4 Dead's somewhat campy zombie apocalypse, and throws in a healthy dose of the original Portal's dark humor to make one impressive, thoroughly enjoyable experience that will have you grinning from start to finish.

Cinematically, Portal 2 has presented some of the most awe-inspiring scenes ever seen in gaming. I don't want to spoil it, but the first few minutes alone are so impressive, it literally took my breath away. Not since the opening scene of BioShock was I so awestruck at every single detail, from the grandiose to the minute. You feel a very real sense of being there, and if not for Wheatley's contagious ineptitude and silliness, it would be absolutely terrifying.

Get it now. For science.
sexy

meh 8hr demo. cant wait till the real game comes out.

edit: 21/09/2016 steam changed review to positive. CON-ARTIST-STEAM! returned to negative!

Chell, Glados are back with a great new A.I. named Wheatley that almost steals the show. Portal fans rejoice, this sequel is worth your cash despite being a relatively short single player adventure.

This game is a fine example of why Valve are my favourite devs. 
Well made puzzles, fantastic characters and dialogue and is a sequel which actually delivers more than it's predecessor which is rare these days. The ending is one of the most satisfying I have seen in a long time, I really have no complaints about this game :)

Worth the hype IMO. Good buy.

I thought that it would be impossible to make a sequel to Portal that had the same feel as the first. I thought that, even if they managed to make a sequel with that feel, it would just be more maps with GlaDOS taunting you. I thought that this game couldn't possibly live up to all of the hype.

I was wrong on all counts.
Its awesome.

Co-op is a blast, if you played the first portal it's pretty much the sequel accept they add some new tools. Gel's that either make you jump, portable maker surface or speed run. They also have beams. Definitely worth the game time, hit me up if you own it, lets play.

As someone who wasn't the biggest fan of the first one, I must say that Portal 2 is excellent. As gaming goes, the story and characters are solid and both single player and coop are worth going through. When you are done, there are still a ton of interesting achievements to aim for to add some more playtime.
Simply Amazing. Best writing I've seen in a long time for a video game.

Have only played it for a few hours and looks like a solid sequel with some clever new features! It is not mandatory that you have played the first Portal.

-- Stoic

You have to get this game; If you have played the orginal portal that is.

Combines a great story with amazing twists leaving you not to know what will be next unlike in the original portal where you had 19 levels then the boss which was extreamly easy to beat :)

Co-Op feature is a masterpiece although can be dreiry at the beginning you will soon see the story of that coming into it.

Its a must buy :DD and a 10/10 from me.

Да, пожалуй эта игра, одна из лучших когда либо мною игранных. Она превзошла все мои ожидания, недочетов практически нет да они и незаметны перед обилием достоинсв.
Атмосфера, сюжет, озвучка - всё на высочайшем уровне, а главное в ней есть ДУША..
Эта игра - ещё одно доказательство того, что Valve гении в своём деле, и с каждой новой игрой поднимают планку качества игр на новый уровень.

Моя оценка 10 из 10.

INCREDIBLE Gameplay with complex puzzles that when completed provide a real feel good feeling. With added Co-Op mode, teaming up with friends has never been better, with dual portal guns at your side, theres many a puzzle ahead!
10/10 Best Buy.
SPAAAAACE!
Fantastic game with a great single player aspect and a simply amazing co-op mode. Both mentally challenging while still being unbeleivably fun.
There will be cake !

Loved the story, very valve style, also Weathley fitted his role very nicely (love his jokes and hacking attempts). Recommended.

BEST GAME OF 2011. AND I GOT IT FOR 34€ :D

Maso Maso. No es un mal juego, todo lo contrario, pero esperaba mas de la campaña sp, algo mas dificl. Me parecio muy corta la capaña. Faltaron muchos puzles con momentum intercambiando portales en el aire en rapida susecion o algunos que sean mucho mas dificiles, con mas pasos para resolverlos. Lo considero un juego "facil". El coop esta bueno pero una vez que lo pasas, no te queda otra que dejar de jugarlo. Lo del store es deplorable, espero que agreguen dlc gratis para extender la vida util del juego.

Лучшая игра в которую доводилось играть за последний год: отличный сингл, оригинальный юмор, суперская концовка да и вообще в игре все сделано, не побоюсь этого слова, идеально! Valve постарались от души - побольше бы таких разрабов...
If you enjoyed Portal 1, you're gonna this, if you haven't buy now and get both games!
Holy mother of god. Holy-mother-of-god. Buy it. Now. NOW.
:D
If you like to think, buy this game. I you don't, buy this game and give it to someone who does.
BUY IT! :O

Valve expanded upon the short-burst, cinematic experience of the first Portal, and the result is a full-fledged, amazingly detailed adventure, that provides both an entertaining atmosphere and answers to a few crucial questions from the first game.

Portal 2 boasts a quality singleplayer playtime that puts many contemporary AAA-titles to shame, interesting puzzles that can literally twist your mind upside-down and a multiplayer co-op mode, all wrapped in a detailed graphical engine, and grade A+ voice acting.

Also, a starting price of ~35e is really nice for a game of this caliber.

Fantasic and humorous storytelling!
Rewarding and clever gameplay!
One of the better games i've played!

The only really bad thing i can come up with is...
The store and the loadout thingy.
So stupid.
But you're not in need of anything there so it's ok.

awsome game, good pace, jokes are solid, story is meh but your not really here for the story,
the game is on the easy side and it only took me about 7-8 hours to beat (co-op and singel player)

it is a pass untill it drops in price or more added content sens there isn't enough to warrent it's current price tag

Oh my god this game. I don't even know where to begin. Just mouse over the text that says "Overwelmingly positive". Ya, 99% positive reviews. Need I say more?

Wow, what a ride. They definitely beefed up the single player campaign duration. I'd say I spent about 8 hours, with a few of the final test chambers really making me stop and think.

I also had the joy of trying out co-op with a fellow Redditor. There's some real head scratchers in there. But with two brains, it makes it a bit easier. Voice coms make the process much smoother.

If you loved the first Portal, this is a definite buy.

9,5/10

Orgasmic.

The Single greatest game i have ever played in my entire life hands down.
Potatoes

So I have just finished the single player and it was excellent. The sequel took the original and showed it for the tiny fraction of potential it was. Looking forward to doing the coop soon and the inevitable "portal under partner" pranks that insue. The voice acting is tremendous, GLaDOS has a tough time trying to keep the spotlight against the likes of Wheatley and Cave Johnson. Fantastically told story which shows just how little was revealed in the first Portal. By far the most improved thing in this game was the graphics though. The destructability of the environments and the enormity of the complex is staggering. On more than one occasion I looked into a chasm or void and was rewarded with a scene that instantly reminded me of the "Neo wakes up" scene in the Matrix. The length of the game is at least twice as long as the original but that is still not long enough, but this is a small quibble against what is easily the best game I have played this year.
Awesome!!

The sequel to the amazing hit portal released in 2007, this game plays like the original but is story much better story, puzzles, graphics. it awesome. go buy it.
its amazing
Absolutely amazing game.  100 times better than Portal 1.  The puzzles are addictive, the storyline is great, and it has co-op....what more could you ask from a game?

Alors,

Das Spiel übertrifft seinen Vorgänger um Längen. In Grafik, Kiffligkeit, psycho-Atmosphäre und all dem anderem was an Portal (1) so Geil war. Ein absolutes Meisterwerk! Ich erwarte euch im Co-op!
If you liked the first one, you're gonna LOVE the second one.

Portal 2 includes single player and co-op. The single player contains a very good and hilarious script, challenging puzzles, and a dynamic plot. The co-op is similar but not story based. Both modes contains hours and hours of fun. There is also a dev commentary with a rich amount of info about the development of the game. Portal 2 is one of the best 3d puzzle games ive ever played, this is a must have.
